articles.title: FedEx founder and former CEO Fred Smith dies aged 80 - BBC
articles.summary: FedEx founder and former boss Fred Smith dies aged 80 Fred Smith, founder of the US parcel delivery giant Federal Express, has died at the age of 80, the company has announced. Mr Smith founded the firm in 1973 having previously served in the US Marine Corps. He ran the company as CEO until 2022. "Fred was more than just...

articles.title: Trump insults Powell again as another top Fed official joins the call to lower interest rates - CNN
articles.summary: Trump insults Powell again as another top Fed official joins the call to lower interest rates Updated 7:15 PM EDT, Fri June 20, 2025 Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller in Washington, DC, on March 22, 2024.
